mapper.insert: insert into sea_news (n_id, tid, n_title, n_pic, n_hit, n_money, n_rank, n_digg, n_tread, n_commend, n_author, n_color, n_addtime, n_note, n_letter, n_isunion, n_recycled, n_entitle, n_outline, n_keyword, n_from, n_score, n_scorenum, n_content) values (#{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nNote,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nIsunion,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nRecycled,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{nEntitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nOutline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_news set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_title = #{nTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_pic = #{nPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_hit = #{nHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_money = #{nMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_rank = #{nRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_digg = #{nDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_tread = #{nTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_commend = #{nCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_author = #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_color = #{nColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_addtime = #{nAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_note = #{nNote,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_letter = #{nLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_isunion = #{nIsunion,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_recycled = #{nRecycled,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, n_entitle = #{nEntitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_outline = #{nOutline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_keyword = #{nKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_from = #{nFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_score = #{nScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, n_scorenum = #{nScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_content = #{nContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select n_id, tid, n_title, n_pic, n_hit, n_money, n_rank, n_digg, n_tread, n_commend, n_author, n_color, n_addtime, n_note, n_letter, n_isunion, n_recycled, n_entitle, n_outline, n_keyword, n_from, n_score, n_scorenum, n_content from sea_news where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select n_id, tid, n_title, n_pic, n_hit, n_money, n_rank, n_digg, n_tread, n_commend, n_author, n_color, n_addtime, n_note, n_letter, n_isunion, n_recycled, n_entitle, n_outline, n_keyword, n_from, n_score, n_scorenum, n_content from sea_news
